# Sri Vengateswaraa Matriculation Higher Secondary school

| established    = 2007
| closed         = 2019
| type           = Private
| medium         = English
| chairman = S.B.Yuvaraj; BA.
| headmaster     =
| colours        = Green, Merun
| location       = Vennanthur
| district       = Namakkal district
| state          = Tamil Nadu

| website        =http://www.srivengatesh.org/
}}
Sri Vengateswaraa Matriculation Higher Secondary school is located in Vennanthur, Namakkal district. Near to Sri Vengateswaraa Polytechnic College and it was founded in 2007 with the goal of educating poor students.
Management
The school is run by the Sri Ragavendra educational trust.
